name: Chambara
description: The award-winning couch-multiplayer stealth brawler comes to PC! Duel in a black and white world where foes can come from anywhere!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.8 GHz or faster Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: Any from the last 4 years Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics Card with Shader Model 3 support, 2GB video memory Storage: 2 GB available space
